inclusion.criterion: T2DM with no change in type/dose of diabetic medication in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alanine transaminase (ALT) level is up to 36 U/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine (up to 60 years) level is between 0.57 - 1.36 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine (> 60 years) level is between 0.68 - 1.48 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Satisfactory haematological or biochemical functions tests only
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has history of recurrent hypoglycaemia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with a history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days. Abdominopelvic CT scan revealed a large prostate and a bladder filled with urine.
